Question
========

If Jan has an IQ score of 100, this means that

Answerlist
----------

* 50% of the norming sample answered fewer items correctly than Jan.
* Jan answered half the questions in the IQ test correctly.
* Jan's mental age is equal to his physical age.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 50% of the norming sample answered fewer items correctly than Jan: Correct
* Jan answered half the questions in the IQ test correctly: Incorrect
* Jan's mental age is equal to his physical age: Incorrect
